code: export var convert24TimeTo12=function convert24TimeTo12(time){time=time.toString().match(/^([01]\d|2[0-3])(:)([0-5]\d)(:[0-5]\d)?$/)||[time];if(time.length>1){time=time.slice(1);time[5]=+time[0]<12?' am':' pm';time[0]=+time[0]%12||12;}return time.join('');};export var convert12TimeTo24=function convert12TimeTo24(time){var hours=Number(time.match(/^(\d+)/)[1]);var minutes=Number(time.match(/:(\d+)/)[1]);var AMPM=time.match(/\s(.*)$/)[1];if(AMPM==="pm"&&hours<12)hours=hours+12;if(AMPM==="am"&&hours===12)hours=hours-12;var sHours=hours.toString();var sMinutes=minutes.toString();if(hours<10)sHours="0"+sHours;if(minutes<10)sMinutes="0"+sMinutes;return"".concat(sHours,":").concat(sMinutes,":00");};export var isTransporter=function isTransporter(){return localStorage.getItem("UserType")==="transporter";};export var isTransporterMaster=function isTransporterMaster(){return localStorage.getItem("IsTransporterMaster")==="true";};export var isTeamMember=function isTeamMember(){return localStorage.getItem("IsTeamMember")==="true";};
